channel.title: Please help on weopons?
channel.description: How do I change how a charecter attacks with a weopon. On most servers there are gaps. Like say you have a quest weopon usually when you attack something with it it dissapears and looks like you punching it. I also have one last question... Is it possible to change how a item is held? like when you weild a certain weopon it equips in the left hand not the sheild slot the left hand.?. :confused:

item.title: Please help on weopons?
item.dc:creator: @blakdaddy blakdaddy
item.description:
@blakdaddy wrote:

“you” dont.
and i say this with the least bit of respect. If you cant pass a 5th grade spelling test, you shouldent even try to code a private server using java

Read full topic
